name: DRM: Death Ray Manta
overview: Death Ray Manta has lasers in his head. He blew up his house, now he lives in space instead. SCENARIO: Death Ray Manta is a short-form twin-stick arena shooter where you blow up enemies using colourful laser beams. You spawn in the centre of the screen, moments later the screen is filled with mines, robots, rabbits, and lasers from beyond the stars. Collect space gems for bonus points and shoot everything else. With 32 screens of increasingly colourful and crazy laser firing mayhem, how far into fish space can you get? FEATURES: - Pure ’80s arcade action - 32 challenging screens - Neon-drenched visuals - Stellar synthwave soundtrack - Southpaw option
